text: Paula da Silva Marques (born 7 December 2000), known as Paula da Silva, is an Andorran footballer who plays as a defender for the Andorra women's national team. ==Career== Da Silva has been capped for the Andorra national team, appearing for the team during the 2019 FIFA Women's World Cup qualifying cycle. She also appeared in two friendlies against Luxembourg on 10 November 2018 and 24 June 2019. ==References== ==External links== * Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Women's association football defenders Category:Andorran women's footballers Category:Andorra women's international footballers Category:Andorran people of Portuguese descent
title: Paula da Silva
